title: Life Purpose Discovery
description: Finding meaning, direction, and calling in your life

modules.title: The Quest for Meaning
modules.description: Why purpose matters and what it really is

modules.title: Looking Back
modules.description: Mining your history for purpose clues

modules.title: Your Core Values
modules.description: Identifying what truly matters to you

modules.title: Obstacles to Purpose
modules.description: Working with fear, doubt, and practical concerns

modules.title: Living Your Purpose
modules.description: A life of meaning and direction

questions.question: Purpose is best understood as:
options: A sense of meaning and direction that guides your life
Something you either have or don't

questions.question: Your values are important for purpose because:
options: They tell you what to avoid
They reveal what truly matters to you and guide meaningful action

questions.question: Discovering your strengths helps with purpose because:
options: It shows what you can uniquely contribute

questions.question: Contribution and service relate to purpose by:
options: Making purpose about helping others, not yourself
Connecting your gifts to the needs of the world
Being the only source of purpose

questions.question: Purpose is:
options: An ongoing process of discovery and living

subtitle: Find your calling, live your mission
